AUNT PRISCILLA’S CLAM CHOWDER (NEW ENGLA.instructions:
In a small baggie, combine **Flour** (weighed at 10 1/2 oz), **Salt**, and **Pepper**; set aside.
Chop **Onion**, **Potatoes**, and **Celery**; boil in plenty of water until tender (~30 minutes). Reserve ~3 cups water. Measure out 2 cups cooked veggies.
In a large double boiler, heat cooked veggies, **Butter**, and **Clams** (with juice) until Butter is melted.
In a separate bowl, whisk the Flour mix into 1 quart of **Half and Half** until lumps are gone.
Add this slurry to the hot clam mixture; stir well. Slowly add the remaining 1 quart of Half and Half.
Cook ~30 minutes, stirring regularly, until thick and creamy.
Serve hot with oyster crackers.

CREAM PIE.instructions:
In a saucepan, mix **Sugar** and **Cornstarch** (or **Flour**). Slowly add **Milk** and bring to a gentle boil, stirring until thickened.
Remove from heat, add **Butter** and **Vanilla**.
Temper the **Egg** yolks and stir them back into the mixture. Cook briefly to set.
Pour into a baked pie shell.
Top with meringue or whipped cream.

CHILI VERDE.instructions:
Brown **Pork** with **Onions** and spices.
Combine all ingredients in a crock pot.
Cook on low all day (or simmer on the stove at least 1 hour), stirring occasionally.

SALMON BALL.instructions:
Combine all ingredients thoroughly.
Shape into a ball and chill.
Roll in chopped pecans.
Serve with crackers and garnish with parsley.

ingredients.White Cake: Half-sheet or jelly-roll size (use mix or bakery cake)
ingredients.Powdered Sugar: 1 cup (plus 1 cup used in whipped cream)

STRAWBERRY DREAM CAKE.instructions:
Prepare a thin layer of white cake.
Whip **Cream** with 1 cup **Powdered Sugar**; set aside.
Beat **Cream Cheese** with 1 cup **Powdered Sugar**; fold in whipped Cream and **Vanilla**.
Spread on cooled cake (top and sides).
Prepare Danish Dessert; fold in sliced **Strawberries**.
Spoon over the cream layer.
Chill. Serves ~20.

4Bs OLD FASHIONED CREAM OF TOMATO SOUP.instructions:
Combine **Chicken Base**, **Water**, **Butter**, **Onion**, and **Sugar** in a pot; simmer until Onion is clear.
Add **Tomatoes** and **Baking Soda**; stir well.
Add **Creams** and gently heat. Serve hot.

ORANGE BOW KNOTS.instructions:
Dissolve **Yeast** in **Warm Water**.
In a large bowl, combine lukewarm **Milk**, **Shortening**, **Sugar**, **Salt**, and 2 cups **Flour**.
Stir in **Eggs**, Yeast, **Orange Juice**, and Peel. Add more Flour for a soft dough.
Let rest 10 minutes, then knead 8-10 minutes.
Let rise ~2 hours; punch down, rest 10 minutes.
Shape into bow knots; let rise ~45 minutes.
Bake at 350°F until lightly browned.

ingredients.Water: enough to fill half the roaster

BEEF FRENCH DIP.instructions:
Rub **Beef Roast** with **Kitchen Bouquet**, **Garlic**, and seasonings.
Place in a deep roaster with **Water** half full, add **Ketchup**, **Mustard**, **Onions**, **Carrots**, **Celery**.
Cover and cook at 200°F for ~20 hours.
Slice and use juices for dipping.

PRIME RIB.instructions:
Roast at 300°F for ~20 minutes per pound.
Let stand 1 hour (in the turned-off oven) before carving.

POLLO PASTORELLA.instructions:
Sauté **Mushrooms** and **Onions** in 1/4 cup **Butter**; set aside.
In a large pan, melt 4 tbsp **Butter**, whisk in 4 tbsp **Flour**.
Gradually add **Broth**, **Wine**, and **Lemon Juice**; stir until thickened.
Add Mushrooms, Onions, and **Capers**.
Just before serving, stir in **Peas**.
Serve over broiled **Chicken** Breasts.
Thin sauce with heated Broth if needed.

FOOL PROOF PIE CRUST.instructions:
Stir **Flour**, **Sugar**, and **Salt** in a bowl.
Cut in **Shortening** until crumbly.
In a separate bowl, beat **Egg**, **Water**, and **Vinegar**; add to Flour mixture until moistened.
Divide dough into 4 portions, flatten, wrap, and chill 30+ minutes.
Roll each between wax paper to fit 9-10 inch pie pans.

RICE PILAF.instructions:
Melt **Butter**; add **Rice** and brown slightly (do not burn Butter).
Add **Vermicelli**, **Almonds**, **Rosemary**, **Salt**, and **Pepper**.
Pour simmering **Broth** over Rice mixture, cover, reduce heat, and simmer ~20 minutes.
Turn off heat and fluff.
Can hold for 2 hours without reheating.

CLAM CHOWDER.large_quantity_note: Uses a 21.5 oz flour mix and 4 qts half-and-half.

ingredients.Flour Mix: 21 1/2 oz (with 2 tbsp salt, 2 tsp pepper mixed in)

CLAM CHOWDER.instructions:
Simmer **Potatoes**, **Celery**, and **Onion** in **Water** until tender; do not drain.
In the top of a double boiler, combine **Clams**, juice, cooked Veggies, **Butter**, and ~1.5 qts **Water/Broth**.
Heat to melt Butter.
Stir in **Flour Mix** with ~2 qts **Half-and-Half**.
Then add the remaining 2 qts Half-and-Half.
Heat 25-30 min, stirring frequently, until thickened.

CHOCOLATE CREAM PIE.instructions:
Combine **Sugar** and **Cornstarch**. Stir in **Milk** and **Chocolate**.
Cook over medium heat, stirring, until it bubbles.
Cook 2 minutes more.
Temper **Egg Yolks** and return them to the hot filling.
Bring to a boil; cook 2 more minutes.
Remove from heat; stir in **Butter** and **Vanilla**.
Pour into a baked crust.

ingredients.Butter or Margarine: enough to grease dish + spread on bread

CHEESE SOUFFLE.instructions:
Butter a 9x13 dish.
Butter Bread, cut into cubes.
Layer half the Bread cubes, half the Cheeses, half the Sausage. Repeat layers.
Whisk **Eggs**, **Half-and-Half**, and seasonings.
Pour over layers. Cover and refrigerate overnight.
Bake at 325°F ~1 hour, until set and lightly browned.

POTATOES AUGRATIN.instructions:
Layer **Potatoes**, **Salt/Pepper**, **Onion**, and **Cheese** in a baking dish, repeating layers with Cheese on top.
Pour **Cream** over.
Cover and bake at 350°F ~45 min.
Uncover and bake 15-20 min longer or until Potatoes are tender.

PEANUT BRITTLE.instructions:
Cook **Water**, **Sugar**, and **Syrup** to 250°F.
Add **Peanuts** + **Salt**.
Continue cooking to 295°F.
Remove from heat; add **Butter**, **Vanilla**, and **Baking Soda**.
Stir and pour onto greased cookie sheets.

2 DOZEN ENCHILADAS.note: Recipe makes ~4 dozen tortillas but final yield is about 2 dozen filled enchiladas if desired.

ingredients.Enchilada Sauce: 1 large can (Las Palmas or Rosarita, mild)

2 DOZEN ENCHILADAS.instructions:
Heat **Oil** in a pan.
Quickly dip **Tortillas** in hot Oil, then in warmed **Enchilada Sauce**/**Soup** mixture.
Fill each Tortilla with **Cheese**, **Olives**, **Onion**.
Roll and place in a baking pan.
Top with remaining Cheese.
Bake at 350°F ~15-20 min until bubbly.
Serve with **Sour Cream**.

ingredients.Grated Cheddar Cheese: 3 cups total (2 cups in sauce, 1 cup topping)

O’BRIEN POTATOES.instructions:
Make a white sauce with **Butter**, **Flour**, and **Milk**. Season to taste.
Stir in 2 cups **Cheese**, **Pimento**, **Green Pepper**, and **Onion**.
Layer half the **Potatoes** in a 9x13 pan, season, top with half the sauce and some Cheese.
Add remaining Potatoes, season, top with remaining sauce and Cheese.
Bake at 350°F ~45 minutes.

PAELLA SALAD.instructions:
Heat **Oil**, sauté **Onion**.
Add **Bouillon** and spices; bring to a boil.
Stir in **Rice**, cover, cook on low ~30 min or until liquid is absorbed.
Chill.
Combine chilled Rice with **Shrimp**, **Chicken**, **Peppers**, **Capers**, **Pimento**, **Celery**, and enough **Italian Dressing** to moisten.
Garnish with **Tomatoes** and **Olives**.

OLD FASHIONED CARROT CAKE.instructions:
Combine dry ingredients.
Add **Oil**; mix well.
Add **Eggs** and **Carrots**; mix again.
Bake at 350°F for 30-40 minutes.
Cool before frosting.

GREEN CHILI SALSA.instructions:
Mix everything in a large bowl.
Chill.
Serve cold.

ROQUEFORT DRESSING.instructions:
Combine all ingredients.
Thin with **Buttermilk** if too thick.
Chill before serving.

CHEESE CHICKEN BROCCOLI CASSEROLE.instructions:
Steam **Chicken**; reserve broth.
Make a white sauce with broth; melt **Cheese** into it.
Cook **Noodles**, drain.
Layer Noodles, **Broccoli**, Chicken, Sauce; repeat.
Top with more Cheese and Bread Crumbs.
Bake at 350°F for 30-40 min.

POLLO ORANGE SAUCE (SERVES 20).instructions:
Heat everything except **Cornstarch** to just under boiling.
Before serving, whisk in a **Cornstarch** slurry to thicken.
Ladle over broiled **Chicken** Breasts, each garnished with an orange slice.

TACO SOUP.instructions:
Brown **Meat** and **Onion**; season with **Garlic Salt**.
Add **Water**, **Beans**, **Tomatoes**, **Sauce**, and **Taco Seasoning**.
Simmer ~15 min.
Adjust seasoning (**Cumin**, **Chili Powder**) if desired.
Serve with **Cheese**, **Avocado**, **Sour Cream**, **Fritos**.

YEAST ROLLS.instructions:
Dissolve **Yeast** in cooled, scalded **Milk** with **Sugar**.
Let stand 5 min.
Add **Eggs**, **Shortening**, **Salt**, and **Flour**.
Knead 10 min.
Let rise 1 hr; punch down.
Shape into rolls, let rise another 1 hr.
Bake at 425°F until golden.

PUMPKIN CHOCOLATE CHIP COOKIES.instructions:
Cream **Shortening** and **Sugar**.
Add **Egg** and **Pumpkin**.
Stir in dry ingredients.
Fold in **Chocolate Chips**.
Drop spoonfuls onto cookie sheet.
Bake at 350°F ~10-12 min, until lightly browned.

marinade_one.instructions: Combine **Orange Juice**, **Soy Sauce**, **Garlic**, **Rosemary**, and **Salt and Pepper**. Marinate pork tenderloin or chicken, letting it sit all afternoon if possible for best flavor.

marinade_two.instructions: Combine **Oil**, **Soy Sauce**, **Vinegar**, **Honey**, **Hoison Sauce**, and **Garlic**. Use with pork tenderloin or chicken, marinating for several hours. Great on shish kabobs or chicken tenderloin skewers.

CHICKEN SALAD.instructions: Blend **Salt**, **Onion**, **Lemon Juice**, **Mayonnaise**, and **Pepper**. Pour half of this mix over the diced **Chicken** and refrigerate overnight. Before serving, add the **Celery**, **Pecans**, and remaining dressing. Serve in a tomato bowl or use as a sandwich filling.

GREEN BEAN SALAD.instructions:
Toast **Almonds** in a non-stick pan, add **Soy Sauce**, and stir constantly until moisture is gone. Cool and chop coarsely.
Steam or microwave **Green Beans** until just tender, then cool.
In a bowl, combine **Rice Vinegar**, **Sesame Oil**, **Garlic**, **Ginger**, **Green Onions**, and **Cilantro**. Add the cooled beans and toss.
Sprinkle roasted almonds on top and serve.

WENDI’S OATMEAL CHOCOLATE CHIP COOKIES.instructions:
Cream together **Sugars** and **Butter** for a couple of minutes. Add **Eggs** one at a time until fully incorporated. Sprinkle in **Salt**, **Baking Soda**, **Baking Powder**, and **Vanilla**, blending well.
Alternate adding **Flour** and **Oats** until mixed thoroughly. Stir in **Chocolate Chips** (and **Pecans** if desired).
Scoop dough with a small cookie scoop. Bake in a preheated oven at 400°F for ~11 minutes. Cookies should be golden, firm on the outside, and softer inside. Let rest on the cookie sheet a couple of minutes before moving to a cooling rack.
